name: BeDiced
description:
BeDiced is a game created in under 48 hours for GMTK2022.  

Roll the dice and use them to control the dropper. By aligning 3 or more of the same color block, you score points. The game ends when your stacked tower reaches over the red dotted line. Can you beat your highscore ?

There is a version with a combo multiplier, but ... I was literally 1 minute too late to put it in :) Trust me, it's there ;) Hope you enjoy the game !
